mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_access_log (access_time, ip, url, user_agent, referer) VALUES (#{accessTime}, #{ip}, #{url}, #{userAgent}, #{referer})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_access_log ORDER BY access_time DESC
SELECT * FROM tb_access_log ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT #{count}
SELECT * FROM tb_access_log WHERE id < #{exclusiveBaseId} ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT #{count}
SELECT * FROM tb_access_log WHERE DATE_FORMAT(access_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{date} ORDER BY access_time DESC

SELECT day, SUM(count) pageviews, COUNT(count) unique_visitors FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(access_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS day, COUNT(1) AS count FROM tb_access_log GROUP BY day, ip ) V GROUP BY day ORDER BY day DESC
SELECT user_agent, COUNT(1) AS count FROM tb_access_log GROUP BY user_agent ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT ip, COUNT(1) AS count FROM tb_access_log WHERE user_agent LIKE '%<a%' GROUP BY ip ORDER BY count DESC, ip ASC
